mapper.select: SELECT FILE_ID, ARTICLE_ID, NEW_NAME, ORIGINAL_NAME, REPOSITORY_PATH, FILE_ICON, FILE_SIZE, FILE_TYPE, TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID FROM SYS_BOARD_FILE WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy} FOR UPDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_BOARD_FILE ( FILE_ID, ARTICLE_ID, NEW_NAME, ORIGINAL_NAME, REPOSITORY_PATH, FILE_ICON, FILE_SIZE, FILE_TYPE, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID ) VALUES ( ${FILE_ID}, ${ARTICLE_ID}, ${NEW_NAME}, ${ORIGINAL_NAME}, ${REPOSITORY_PATH}, ${FILE_ICON}, ${FILE_SIZE}, ${FILE_TYPE}, ${INSERT_DATE}, ${INSERT_USER_ID}, ${UPDATE_DATE}, ${UPDATE_USER_ID} )

INSERT INTO SYS_BOARD_FILE ( FILE_ID, ARTICLE_ID, NEW_NAME, ORIGINAL_NAME, REPOSITORY_PATH, FILE_ICON, FILE_SIZE, FILE_TYPE, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repositoryPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insertDate,jdbcType=TIME}, #{insertUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIME}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_BOARD_FILE SET ARTICLE_ID = ${ARTICLE_ID}, NEW_NAME = ${NEW_NAME}, ORIGINAL_NAME = ${ORIGINAL_NAME}, REPOSITORY_PATH = ${REPOSITORY_PATH}, FILE_ICON = ${FILE_ICON}, FILE_SIZE = ${FILE_SIZE}, FILE_TYPE = ${FILE_TYPE}, INSERT_DATE = ${INSERT_DATE}, INSERT_USER_ID = ${INSERT_USER_ID}, UPDATE_DATE = ${UPDATE_DATE}, UPDATE_USER_ID = ${UPDATE_USER_ID} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}

UPDATE SYS_BOARD_FILE SET ARTICLE_ID = #{articleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEW_NAME = #{newName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGINAL_NAME = #{originalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPOSITORY_PATH = #{repositoryPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_ICON = #{fileIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_SIZE = #{fileSize,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, FILE_TYPE = #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSERT_DATE = #{insertDate,jdbcType=TIME}, INSERT_USER_ID = #{insertUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIME}, UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE 1 = 1 ${additionalAttributesForUpdateWithDto}
